set.name: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 4

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature attacks, if you have at least one darkness card and one fire card in your mana zone, you may reveal this creature from your hand and put it on the bottom of your deck. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less and destroy it. Oniend: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if any player has no shields, choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less and destroy it.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 4

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may break one of your shields. If you break a shield in this way, untap up to 6 cards in your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 4

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ABARECHAIN}: Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if it's the first attack this turn, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may take a creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 4

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature attacks your opponent each turn if able.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 4

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MUGEN CLIMB} Water 2(You may summon this creature from your hand or graveyard by tapping 2 of your creatures and paying Water 2.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack.
